Goodbye!

I'm happy to assist!
My name is Pennywise Bot.
You can call me Pennywise Bot.
I am Pennywise Bot, created by the Pennywise team to assist you with managing your finances through our budget app.
My purpose is to help you manage your finances effectively using the Pennywise budget app.

patterns: What can I do with the app?
responses: Some of the features include expense tracking, budget planning, account management, bill reminders, and personalized financial insights.
You can track expenses, create budgets, manage accounts, set bill reminders, and receive insights to optimize your finances.
To add an expense, go to the Expenses section and click on 'Add Expense'.
Record your expenses by entering the details in the Expenses tab.
Plan your budget by setting spending limits for different categories in the Budget section.
Create and manage your budget by allocating funds to various expense categories.
Set reminders for upcoming bills or important financial deadlines in the Reminders section.
Never miss a payment with our bill reminder feature.
Receive personalized financial insights and analysis to optimize your spending habits and achieve your financial goals.
Unlock valuable insights into your spending patterns and financial trends.
To view your accounts, go to the Accounts section.
You can check your account balances under the Accounts tab.
To view your transactions, navigate to the Transactions section.
You can check your transaction history under the Transactions tab.
You can set up your budget in the Budget section of the app.
For budget planning, head to the Budget tab.
To manage your debts, visit the Debts section.
You can track and repay your debts under the Debts tab.
You can create and manage your wishlist items in the Wishlist section.
To see your wishlist, go to the Wishlist tab.
Set reminders for important dates and events in the Reminders section.
Manage your reminders and get notified about upcoming events under the Reminders tab.
To login, click on the Login button and enter your credentials.
Sign in to your account by providing your username and password.
To create a new account, click on the Sign Up button and follow the registration process.
Sign up as a new user to access all features of the app.
If you forgot your password, you can reset it by clicking on the Forgot Password link and following the instructions.
Recover your password by initiating a password reset process.
Manage your profile settings and update your information under the Profile section.
You can edit your profile details and change your password in the Profile settings.
To logout from your account, click on the Logout button or link.
Sign out from your account to securely exit.
Activate your account by confirming your email address through the activation link sent to your email.
Complete the account activation process to access all features.
